channel.title: Comments on: Scheduled Meeting Dates
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Katie Taylor
item.dc:creator: Katie Taylor
item.description:
Call for Participation
The AgileNorth Committee is inviting individuals or groups to submit presentation or workshop ideas for this year’s one day conference. Interactive presentations are typically 1.5 hours with workshops up to 3 hours and should be based on some aspect of Agile product delivery. Please submit brief details including title, description and indication of audience interaction by the deadline of Monday April 28th April 2014 to kjtaylor@uclan.ac.uk
item.content:encoded:
Call for Participation

The AgileNorth Committee is inviting individuals or groups to submit presentation or workshop ideas for this year’s one day conference. Interactive presentations are typically 1.5 hours with workshops up to 3 hours and should be based on some aspect of Agile product delivery. Please submit brief details including title, description and indication of audience interaction by the deadline of Monday April 28th April 2014 to kjtaylor@uclan.ac.uk
